release_notes.en-US: I like Compact Headers, but button of Compact Headers was not visible on FrameWhite. So, I changed message Header color of FrameWhite so that button of Compact Headers was shown. And, vague texts color of message header was changed to view them clearly. I present this version to users who love Compact Headers October 15th 2020. From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US: Enjoy white without eye fatigue! FrameWhite is applicable/available in Dark theme! You can change calendar colors to Tools>Options>Calendar>Accessibility>Optimize colors for accessbility. [Notification] 1) If you can not see the title and image of a loading tab, Please, click button of FrameWhite again. 2) FrameWhite does not support Compose window, Address book, Events and Tasks dialog IN TAB. 3) Print message button and manage add-ons button are useful of many buttons and pinned on tabs toolbar. 4) Is there any change in this theme after other action? Please, click button of FrameWhite again. Black or White was realized. send a gift to a friend Eunjo. Version 62.1 1) Quick Filter button text color was changed in black. 2) Calendar unifinder button icon (magnifying glass) color was changed in black. 3) Calendar list create button (cross) color was changed in black. 4) Task actions category button color was changed in black. 5) Task actions markcompleted button color was changed in black. 6) Task actions priority button color was changed in black. 7) Calendar delete task button color was changed in black. Version 62.2 updated in 2020-10-15. I like Compact Headers, but button of Compact Headers was not visible on FrameWhite. So, I changed message Header color of FrameWhite so that button of Compact Headers was shown. And, vague texts color of message header was changed to view them clearly. Next improvements Would you give comments to this version for next improvements? 1) Vague color of selected calendar below calendar list on Lightning side bar is... 2) Major toolbar buttons' icon and text colors are... 3) Reversed browserAction icons color on menubar and tabs toolbar is... 4) Message header color is...solved in version 62.2 5) Not visible new loading tab could be solved in auto implementation at loading tab.

Please, click button of FrameWhite again. Black or White was realized. send a gift to a friend Eunjo. Version 62.2 updated in 2020-10-15. I like Compact Headers, but button of Compact Headers was not visible on FrameWhite. So, I changed message Header color of FrameWhite so that button of Compact Headers was shown. And, vague texts color of message header was changed to view them clearly. caption.en-US: You can change calendar colors to Tools>Options>Calendar>Accessibility>Optimize colors for accessbility

summary.en-US:
V 62.2 is available with Tb v78, 83 now as of 2020-10-15.
Executed well.

Enjoy white without eye fatigue!
FrameWhite is applicable/available in Dark theme!

Black or White was realized.

send a gift to a friend Eunjo.
summary.ko:
다크 테마로 전환 가능한 화이트 테마입니다.
사용해본 결과, 눈의 피로가 적고 매혹적입니다.
다른 테마를 원할 때, [Disable white theme] 버튼을 눌러 다크 테마로 전환하세요.

친구 은조에게 선물로 보내며.

2020년 10월 15일.

개발자 황성호.
